actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the depository library program (44 U.S.C. 1901-14).
short_title: Accredited Law Schools Constituted Depositories Act

summary.text: Accredited Law Schools Constituted Depositories Act - Provides that all law schools recognized by the highest court of the State as being accredited shall be constituted depositories, if the law school so desires, to receive Government publications subject to the depository laws.

titles.title: Accredited Law Schools Constituted Depositories Act
A bill to amend the depository library program (44 U.S.C. 1901-14).
